PathOfBuilding.Notes:
IMPORTANT: You can always swap out Manaforged Arrow Setup for Artillery Ballista (More Single Target But Less Mapping Clear) Swap to Crit ASAP Try to Get as Close to 95% Evade as Possible Map Mods are your Worst Enemy- Never Run Ailment Immune Volatility is a little bit less damage, but it will be much better for your Scorch/Freeze. Additional Arrow Quiver should be one of your first upgrades. Only Consider Count 2 if You have Projectiles Return to You Enchant on Bow.
Leveling
Act 1 Level 2: Kill Hillock Quest Reward: Take ^x70FF70Galvanic Arrow^7 Buy Iron Ring in Town ^x70FF70Galvanic Arrow^7 - ^x70FF70Momentum^7
Level 4: Kill Hailrake Quest Reward: Quicksilver Flask, ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 Buy: ^x70FF70Sniper's Mark^7 ^x70FF70Galvanic Arrow^7 - ^x70FF70Mirage Archer ^7 ^x70FF70Shrapnel Ballista^7 - ^x70FF70Momentum ^7(Optional - Can Drop on Bosses or while moving to kill extra Mobs) ^x70FF70Sniper's Mark^7 ^x70FF70Dash^7
Level 8: Arrive at Lower Prison Quest Reward: ^x70FF70Added Cold Damage^7 or ^x70FF70Manaforged Arrows^7 ^x70FF70Galvanic Arrow^7 - ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 - ^x70FF70Momentum^7 or ^x70FF70Added Cold ^7 ^x70FF70Burning Arrow^7 - ^x70FF70Manaforged Arrows Support^7 ^x70FF70Shrapnel Ballista^7 - ^x70FF70Arrow Nova ^7 ^x70FF70Sniper's Mark^7 ^x7070FFFrostblink^7
Level 10: Kill Brutus ^x70FF70^7Quest Reward:^7 ^x70FF70Blink Arrow ^7^7 Buy ^x70FF70Precision^7 (Only Run This Aura if Needed to Trigger Precise Technique - Accuracy > HP)
Level 12: Cavern Arrival Take ^x70FF70Rain of Arrows^7 and ^x70FF70Lightning Arrow^7 (If Possible) ^x70FF70Rain of Arrows^7 - ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 - ^x70FF70Added Cold^7 or ^x70FF70Momentum^7 ^x70FF70^x70FF70Burning Arro^7^x70FF70w^7^7^7 - ^x70FF70Manaforged Arrows Support^7 - ^x70FF70Lightning Arrow Shrapnel Ballista^7 - ^x70FF70Arrow Nova Sniper's Mark^7 ^x70FF70Blink Arrow ^7^7 ^x7070FFFrostblink^7
Act 2
Bandit: Take 8% Move Speed Kratilyn or 15% Resistance from Alira
Level 16: Kill Fidelitas Take ^x70FF70Herald of Ice^7 and ^x70FF70Frenzy^7 Replace Burning Arrow or Lightning Arrow with Frenzy for Frenzy Generation ^x70FF70Rain of Arrows^7^7 - ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 - ^x70FF70Added Cold^7 or ^x70FF70Momentum^7 ^x70FF70^x70FF70Burning Arro^7^x70FF70w^7^7^7 - ^x70FF70Manaforged Arrows Support^7 - ^x70FF70Frenzy Shrapnel Ballista^7 - ^x70FF70Arrow Nova Sniper's Mark^7 ^x70FF70Blink Arrow ^7^7 ^x7070FFFrostblink^7
Level 18: Kill Weaver Take ^x7070FFTrinity^7 or ^xE05030Elemental Damage with Attacks^7 ^x70FF70Rain of Arrows^7^7^7 - ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 - ^x70FF70Added Cold^7 or ^x70FF70Momentum^7 (Can Use 4L with ^x7070FFTrinity^7, Make Sure You have enough of the right damage types to proc trinity. ^x70FF70^x70FF70Burning Arro^7^x70FF70w^7^7^7 - ^x70FF70Manaforged Arrows Support^7 - ^x70FF70Frenzy Shrapnel Ballista^7 - ^x70FF70Arrow Nova Sniper's Mark^7 ^x70FF70Blink Arrow ^7^7 ^x7070FFFrostblink^7 ^x70FF70Herald of Ice^7
Act 3 Level 24: Arrive in Act 3 Town Take Anger and Grace (Level in Offhand) Can Drop ^x70FF70Herald of Ice^7 if you have Mana Issues ^x70FF70Rain of Arrows^7^7^7^7 - ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 - ^x70FF70Added Cold^7 or ^x70FF70Momentum^7 (Can Use 4L with ^x7070FFTrinity^7, Make Sure You have enough of the right damage types to proc trinity. ^x70FF70^x70FF70Burning Arro^7^x70FF70w^7^7^7 - ^x70FF70Manaforged Arrows Support^7 - ^x70FF70Frenzy Shrapnel Ballista^7 - ^x70FF70Arrow Nova Sniper's Mark^7 ^x70FF70Blink Arrow ^7^7 ^x70FF70Herald of Ice^7, ^xE05030Anger^7 ^x7070FFFrostblink^7
Level 28: Kill Gravicius Quest Reward: ^x70FF70Storm Rain^7 Buy: ^x70FF70Blast Rain^x70FF70^x70FF70 ^7Add Another Manaforged Link Setup (Very Dependent on Link and Color RNG) ^x70FF70Rain of Arrows^7^7^7^7^7 - ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 - ^x70FF70Added Cold^7 or ^x70FF70Momentum^7 - ^x7070FFTrinity^7 ^x70FF70^x70FF70Storm Rain - ^x70FF70Manaforged Arrows Support^7 - ^x70FF70Blast Rain Frenzy - Manaforged Arrows Support Sniper's Mark^7 ^x70FF70Blink Arrow, ^x7070FFFrostblink^7 ^x70FF70^xE05030Anger^7^7
Normal Lab: Take Warden Oath of Summer for Scorch Node
Act 4 Level 38: Kill Malachai Quest Reward: ^x70FF70Tornado^7 Buy: ^x70FF70Mark on Hit^7
Act 5 Quest Reward: Jade Flask
Act 6 Do Lily Roth to get Access to all Gems Purchase^xE05030 Lifetap^7 for Manaforged Arrows Setup (Optional as this will Make Manaforged Arrow Trigger take From Your HP Pool) Purchase ^x7070FFFlame Dash^7 to Replace ^x7070FFFrostblink^7 Purchase ^x7070FFPurity of Elements^7 (Very Useful if you are undercapped and dying to Ailments) Auras are extremely flexible at this stage, and you might not be able to run 2 50% Auras until you get aura nodes. ^x70FF70Rain of Arrows^7^7^7^7^7^7 - ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 - ^x70FF70Added Cold^7 or ^x70FF70Momentum^7 - ^x7070FFTrinity^7 ^x70FF70^x70FF70Storm Rain - ^x70FF70Manaforged Arrows Support^7 - ^x70FF70Blast Rain - ^xE05030Lifetap^7 (Do Not Use Lifetap if it kills You) ^x70FF70Frenzy^7 - ^x70FF70Manaforged Arrows Support ^7- ^x70FF70Culling Strike^7 ^x70FF70Sniper's Mark^7^7 - ^x70FF70Mark on HIt^7 ^x70FF70Blink Arrow, ^x7070FFFlame Dash ^x70FF70^xE05030Anger^7^7, ^x7070FFPurity of Elements^7 or ^x70FF70Arctic Armour^7 or ^x70FF70Grace^7 or ^x70FF70Haste^7 (Use Anger for Damage or Purity of Elements to Cap Resistances/Ailment Avoidance, Another Option is to run ^x70FF70Arctic Armour^7 instead of one of the 50% Auras, ^x70FF70Grace^7 is another defensive Option if you are good on resists, Can Also Use ^x70FF70Haste^7 for Max Speed)
Act 7 Cruel Lab: Avatar of the Wilds (Pop on Bossers and Rares for 80% Damage Bonus) Quest Reward: Diamond Flask
Act 9 Quest Reward: ^xFFFF77Spike Point Arrow Quiver^7
Act 10 Quest Reward: Silver Flask Merciless Lab: Oath of Winter (Provides Freeze and Safety when we first enter Maps)
^x7070FF^7When to Swap to ^x70FF70Elemental Hit of the Spectrum^7 Use Trade Site to Buy First One that Pops Up Can Use it once you get the 2 Projectile Nodes on the Tree Need to Prioritize Getting a Quiver with Additional Arrows Early On
Example Setup: ^x70FF70 ^x70FF70Elemental Hit of the Spectrum^7^7 - ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 - ^x7070FFTrinity^7 - ^x70FF70Returning Projectiles^7 ^x70FF70Storm Rain^7 - ^x70FF70Manaforged Arrows Support^7 - ^x70FF70Blast Rain - ^xE05030Lifetap^7 (Do Not Use Lifetap if it kills You) ^x70FF70Frenzy^7 - ^x70FF70Manaforged Arrows Support ^7- ^x70FF70Culling Strike^7 ^x70FF70Sniper's Mark^7^7 - ^x70FF70Mark on HIt^7 ^x70FF70Blink Arrow, ^x7070FFFlame Dash ^x70FF70^xE05030Anger^7^7, ^x7070FFPurity of Elements^7 or ^x70FF70Arctic Armour^7 or ^x70FF70Grace^7 or ^x70FF70Haste^7
